div.div: Press Enter / Return to begin your search.

div.p: ICS West will be closed indefinitely during the COVID-19 pandemic.
Visit our News section for important updates and information.
Send any technical issues or questions to helpdesk@icswest.org.

ul.li: Transportation: Questions about buses or permanent dismissal changes? Contact transportation@icswest.org
Food Services: Questions about lunch, breakfast, or school lunch program? Contact jaclyns@icswest.org
Attendance: Send absence notes and early dismissal requests to attendance@icswest.org

hr.p: Learn about the process of Comprehensive Planning, and then read ICS West’s 2019-2022 Comprehensive Plan.

div.p: SOY UN CIUDADANO DEL MUNDO CUANDO

RESPETO DIFERENTES PUNTOS DE VISTA.
DESAFÍO LOS ESTEREOTIPOS Y LA DESINFORMACIÓN.
TOMO DECISIONES RESPONSABLES.
I AM A GLOBAL CITIZEN WHEN

I RESPECT MULTIPLE POINTS OF VIEW.
I CHALLENGE STEREOTYPES AND MISINFORMATION.
I MAKE RESPONSIBLE DECISIONS.
